structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: A city may establish a basic sewer service charge or basic schedule of graduated charges, applying to all sewer users alike, and may, in its discretion, establish and apply to one or more special classes of users additional service charges.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 6, effective June 19, 1958.
